page.title: 11A DAY IN THE LIFE OF TARA
page.content: {HOME LIFE I live in an old farmhouse near Kilgraston.At 7.40am I rise,wash and dress in my school uniform which is a blue skirt and pale blue blouse,blue jumper and blue nylon overall. My breakfast consists of toast, honey and a glass of milk or a cup of coffee.I attend Kilgraston School which is mostly for boarding pupils but I am one of their day girls.It is set in beautiful surroundings in the country.Each morning we begin lessons with prayers.We have lessons until 10.40am when we have an interval of 20 minutes when I go and talk to my friends or go outside.
